snippet: Mr. Aron, now chief of Starwood Hotels and Resorts Worldwide, will take the top post at the company, which operates AMC Theaters, in January.
abstract: AMC Entertainment Holdings names Adam M Aron president and chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Aron, now chief of Starwood Hotels and Resorts Worldwide, will take the top post at the company, which operates AMC Theaters, in January.

headline.main: AMC Entertainment Names Adam Aron Chief Executive
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Theater Chain AMC Names New Chief From Starwood
